description: PUNY HUMAN! Stop pestering Hulk with dumb questions! Stupid Banner walk into Gamma Bomb blast.  Now not just Banner - but HULK! Hulk will slam, crush, and destroy all puny humans! Hulk is the strongest there is! None shall defeat Hulk!

signature.name: Hulk Rage
signature.description: Hulk is angered by receiving damage, strengthening his attacks by up to 165.4% based on lost Health.  You wouldn't like him when he's angry!
